```{r setup, hw 2}
rmytnorm <- function(n=1, m=0) {
  v <- rep(NA, n)
  for(i in 1:n) {
    v[i] <- -1
    while(v[i]<0) {
      v[i] <- rnorm(1, mean=m)
    }
  }
  return(v)
  
}
dmytnorm <- function(x, m=0) {
  v <- rep(NA, length(x))
  for(i in 1:length(x)) {
    
  if(x[i]<0) {
    v[i] <- 0
  }else {
    v[i] <- 2*dnorm(x[i], mean=m)
  }
  }
  return(v)
  }

```
